Deprecated API

Deprecated Methods
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.CircleLayer.countCircles()
          use countFeatures from super class instead 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.PolygonLayer.countPolygons()
          use countFeatures from super class ShapeLayer 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.CircleLayer.getGeoCircles()
          use the getFeatures method from ShapeLayer instead 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.Viewer.getNavigationBounds()
          see the new NavigateTool object for details 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.GeoPolygon.getPerimiter()
          miss spelling use getPerimeter instead. 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.SelectionManager.getSelection(int)
          - this method serves no real use as far as I can see that isSelected can not do better. 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.raster.Raster.load(String)
          new programs should use readObject. 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.raster.Raster.save(String)
          new programs should use writeObject. 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.GeoLabel.setGeoData(GeoData)
            
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.GeoFormLabel.setGeoData(GeoData)
          Use addHighlightManager(HighlightManger, GeoData d) instead. 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.Viewer.setNavigationBounds(GeoRectangle)
          see the new NavigateTool object for details 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.Viewer.setNavigationTarget(Viewer)
          see the new NavigateTool object for details 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.Scaler.setScaleFactor(double)
            
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.Viewer.setToolMode(int)
          use setTool instead 
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.raster.Raster.streamLoad(DataInputStream)
          new programs should use readObject. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.GeoFormLabel(GeoData)
          Eather construct as empty and then add with addHighlightManager or use full constructor
